## Libraries

```{r, echo=FALSE}
if (!is.null(params$libraries)) {
  knitr::kable(params$libraries, format = "html", caption = "Library Details")
} else {
  cat("No library data available.")
}

```

```{r}
if (!is.null(params$steps)) {
  for (step in names(params$steps)) {
    cat("### Step: ", step, "\n\n")
    cat("- **Timestamp:** ", format(params$steps[[step]]$timestamp, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), "\n")
    cat("- **Main Step:** ", params$steps[[step]]$step, "\n")
    if (!is.null(params$steps[[step]]$substeps)) {
      cat("- **Substeps:**\n")
      for (substep in params$steps[[step]]$substeps) {
        cat("  - ", substep, "\n")
      }
    }
    cat("- **Note:** ", params$steps[[step]]$note %||% "No note provided", "\n\n")
  }
} else {
  cat("No steps logged.")
}
```
